title: Novak Djokovic Complains of Marijuana Smell During Match
content: It wasn't the same smell of grass tennis star Novak Djokovic was familiar with Saturday.During his match against Jeremy Chardy at the Rogers Open, Djokovic complained to an umpire that the stadium smelled of marijuana.Djokovic said 'Somebody's getting high.' Djokovic would beat Chardy 6-4, 6-4, ...
